text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Okay ☆ Now everything is ready ♪ Everyone, come over here!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Woah! Are we eating outside!? It's kind of cold though…!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: It'll be fine! We'll have a snowball fight to warm ourselves up ☆ Anyone who wants to play with me come over here ♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Everyone, eat as much as you like. The food my fans made… it's so delicious. I recommend the stew. I've already had 30 bowls of it.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Oguri, you're eating way too much ☆ But I guess you're always eating too much ★ There must be a black hole inside of you ☆ ★

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: We made sure to prepare a lot of food specifically for Oguri-san, so please eat to your heart's content!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: That's fine, but… why did I have to dress up as Santa too? Mayano, how many outfits did you girls bring? Wait a sec, why did you bring these in the first place?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Come on, don't worry about the details. After all, you look great in Santa's clothing. It's quite adorable.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …! I'm taking these off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Jeez… Anyways, Hayahide, when you get excited you start acting like an old man. Did you know that?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That is quite an awful evaluation… Regardless, would you mind fixing your mood and getting back into the Santa outfit? I want to send a picture of us to Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She never did end up making it, did she…?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: That might not be the case… don't you hear that? It's a real annoying sound after all…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah, I can hear it now. I see… The miracles continue to happen, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahh, that was so much fun ♪ I'm so glad that we got to enjoy the party with everyone, Marve-chin ♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Me too ☆ We also got to see that huge star as well! I thought that would be the end of it, then that happened…

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Oguri's take off was just so inspiring, wasn't it? ☆ Her heart is so big ★ ♪ And her tummy too ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Did you see the look on Oguri-san's fans' faces? It was like they were lost in a trance… focused solely on Oguri-san!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Earlier I was working on an advertisement with this really handsome actor… His fans had the same look on their faces too.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Well… we also have to make sure everyone has a marvelous look on their faces too ☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: So… ☆ Why don't we… become him too?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Marve-chin, you're a genius ♪ Yup, let's do it☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Heart-racing, dream-like, and dazzling! Combine all of that while giving presents to good kids…

text_block_list.name: Mayano & Marvelous
text_block_list.text: And we'll become Santa-san ♪

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Oguri-san, are you heading outside?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah, I just wanted to see the starry sky again.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Ah, okay! Make sure to not catch a cold!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: This is nice… Both inside and outside, the stars are dazzling.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: This really was a lot of fun. I was able to hear all about how they feel about me.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: And I finally understood something. Why was I so happy during that one Christmas…? It was because Santa-san was proud of me for winning.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Inspiration is what you brought us, Oguri-san. Seeing you fly through the sky reminded me of how moved I was when I first witnessed one of your races.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Not only that, it reaffirmed something in me. In your coming race… You'll definitely show me something even more magnificent than you showed tonight, Oguri-san.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Oguri-san, you truly are amazing!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: There's only one way to show everyone my appreciation for all that they've done for me today. I've finally decided on what to give them as a Christmas present.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm going to make a miracle happen.
A few days after the party…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now! Oguri is closing in! Oguri is closing in! Oguri is closing in!! Somehow Oguri Cap has taken the lead!!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: With these legs of mine… I can bring my fans inspiration… happiness… and joy! That's the Christmas present that only I can give them…!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Everyone, keep your eyes on me. I… Oguri Cap will make miracles happen!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaa!!!!
As long as I continue to strive towards making miracles… my Christmas present will never stop giving.
